feature_name: Hub routing and link reliability hardening
scope_summary: Eliminate Hub beta deep-link 404 risk by adding SPA rewrites and static route entrypoints, strengthen non-JS route fallbacks, and reduce crawl waste with direct canonical nav links plus Field Notes compatibility redirects.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Routing, linking, and fallback copy updates only; no policy or terms changes.

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: No new storage scope or network integrations were introduced; changes are static pages and route handling.
evidence: hub/beta/* route entrypoints keep existing local-first app behavior
No new API endpoints or analytics calls added

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: Fallback copy preserves non-medical scope language and does not add diagnosis/treatment claims.
evidence: hub/beta/index.html and route fallback pages retain productivity-only framing

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Reducing broken routes lowers friction and improves predictability for users under cognitive load.
evidence: netlify.toml adds Hub SPA rewrite and Field Notes compatibility redirects
Direct links now resolve without dead-end 404s

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: No neuroscience or clinical claims were added in this routing-focused patch.

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Primary benefit is trust and usability from route reliability; foreseeable harm is low because behavior changes are additive and backward compatible.
evidence: Static internal-link audit now reports zero unresolved internal paths

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Copy changes are concise and aligned with existing tone; no new inflated performance claims.
evidence: No-JS fallback now explains concrete features and links to core trust pages

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Fallbacks now provide meaningful content and navigation in non-JS contexts instead of a minimal blocker message.
evidence: hub/beta/index.html noscript block upgraded with actionable links
Route entry pages include noscript summaries and clear navigation

security_and_reliability.rationale: Route behavior is now deterministic across refreshes and direct-entry paths, reducing false 404 regressions.
evidence: Compatibility redirects added for Field Notes URL variants

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing, upsell, or conversion mechanics changed.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and verify production deep links for /hub/beta/sidekicks/, /tasks/, /settings/, /guide/, and /legal/privacy/.
